com.davidmiguel.gobees.monitoring.algorithm.processors

Class BackgroundSubtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidmiguel.gobees.monitoring.algorithm.processors.BackgroundSubtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VideoProcessor

    public class BackgroundSubtractor
extends java.lang.Object
implements VideoProcessor
    Implements a background subtraction algorithm (in particular, BackgroundSubtractorMOG2).

    • Constructor Detail

      • BackgroundSubtractor

        public BackgroundSubtractor()
        Default BackgroundSubtractor constructor. History is initialized to 10 and shadows threshold to 0.7.

      • BackgroundSubtractor

        public BackgroundSubtractor(int history,
                            double shadowThreshold)
        BackgroundSubtractor constructor.
        Parameters:
        history - the number of frames to consider in the background model.
        shadowThreshold - the threshold to consider a pixel as shadow or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getMogInstance

        private org.opencv.video.BackgroundSubtractorMOG2 getMogInstance(int history,
                                                                 double shadowThreshold)
        Get the instance of BackgroundSubtractorMOG2 with the desired configuration.
        Parameters:
        history - the number of frames to consider in the background model.
        shadowThreshold - the threshold to consider a pixel as shadow or not.
        Returns:
        instance of BackgroundSubtractorMOG2.
